about_the_game:
A sexy village simulation where you can customise your furries and pilot magical mechas, then choose to fight your opponents or, if you can appease them, have sex.

HAVE SEX

It's definitely a good way to produce more allies. But do you really have to kill every other character you encounter? Don't think about it the answer is no. You can be flirty and have some spicy moments with them!

KICK THEM ALL

Or you can just rise an army, equip them with all sorts of magic guns, pilot your 65 feet tall sexy mechas (20 meters) and obliterate everyone.

BASE-BUILDING

Build a workshop to craft mechas and enchanted dolls. Build a forge to unlock new powerful tools. What about an armoury to get magic guns? A tavern to attract travellers or to haggle a bit? Basically you can build a small city!

MAGIC MECHAS

What if you encounter a mountain sized horny god? Build a mountain sized sexy mecha and show them some love! Or kick their ass, you choose.
